406.title: Not Acceptable
406.desc: Your request cannot be processed correctly, please try again later

ErrorCSRF: Csrf validation error, unable to continue
AccessCSRFError: For CSRF security, unauthenticated users cannot access private areas
corsError: Unauthorized access due to CORS policy.
ReactResourcesNotFound: Internal error while trying to load the React compilation, was Vite built?
ResourcesNotFound: Unable to find content on this route, 404
ConnectionNotAllowed: Access blocked, continued access will result in a ban from the server.
